desc: Chilly is reimagining oral care, making it more enjoyable and fun all while creating healthier products. We are starting with Chilly Toothpaste. A Spicy Toothpaste that combines ghost pepper flakes and menthol for an intense brushing experience.

layout.text:
Chilly is the world's most intense toothpaste, made with ghost pepper flakes and menthol for a fire and ice brushing experience. An endorphin rush in every brush.

Use code GETSPICY15 for 15% off
through 7/31/22.
